trans-unit.source: Converts a <xref:System.TimeSpan> expressed in minutes or as a standard infinite time span.
This type, like all the other configuration converter types, converts strings found in the configuration file to and from the related strongly typed properties.
In particular, the TimeSpanMinutesOrInfiniteConverter class converts <xref:System.String> minutes, assigned to a configuration property, to <xref:System.TimeSpan> minutes and vice versa.
If the configuration property has a <xref:System.String> value of "infinite", it converts this value to <xref:System.TimeSpan> and vice versa.
The infinite <xref:System.TimeSpan> value is represented by the <xref:System.TimeSpan.MaxValue> enumeration value.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Configuration.TimeSpanMinutesOrInfiniteConverter"></xref> class.
Normally, you use the converter types provided by the system.
The only time you need to use the TimeSpanMinutesOrInfiniteConverter constructor is when you create your own conversion type.
Converts a <xref:System.String> to a <xref:System.TimeSpan>.

The system uses the ConvertFrom method when reading from a configuration file to convert a <xref:System.String> value to <xref:System.TimeSpan>, or the <xref:System.String> "infinite" to <xref:System.TimeSpan.MaxValue>.
The <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"></xref> object used for type conversions.
The <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> object used during conversion.
The <xref:System.String> object to convert.
The , if the data parameter is the "infinite"; otherwise, the representing the data parameter in minutes.
Converts a <xref:System.TimeSpan> to a <xref:System.String>.
The system uses the ConvertTo method when writing to a configuration file to convert a <xref:System.TimeSpan> value or <xref:System.TimeSpan.MaxValue> to a <xref:System.String>.
The <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"></xref> object used for type conversions.
The <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> object used during conversion.
The value to convert.
The conversion type.
The "infinite", if the value parameter is ; otherwise, the representing the value parameter in minutes.
